# Reading Data  
All the values marked as '?' have been read-in as NA's using built-in feature of pandas read_csv method.  
```{python}
import pandas as pd
dt = pd.read_csv('Blood_Pressure_data.csv', na_values='?' )
```
A sample of random 100 rows from the dataset is displayed below:
```{r}
DT::datatable(py$dt[sample(nrow(py$dt),100),])
```


Shape of the data is given as:

```{python}
dt.shape
```

Names of the columns are given below:
```{r}
names(py$dt)
```
A first summary of the data is given as:
```{python}
dt.describe().round(2)
```
